alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 10:56AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Redwood River at Russell affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Redwood River at Russell. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, the right bank overflows flooding some low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Friday was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Redwood River Russell 14.0 14.1 Fri 10 AM CDT &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
